attributes.action: Make cannabis legal in the uk.
attributes.additional_details:
This would benefit us all.

In parts of the world where you can legally buy cannabis it is a billion pound + business.

Now here in the uk (Stuck in the dark ages) we spend millions trying to stop the sale and we waste police time on a substance that causes less medical issues / deaths than smoking or drinking.


In parts of the world cannabis oils and special breads have been created to help people with illnesses.

Just the other day in the daily mail there was a story how cannabis oil saved a baby's life after doctors said she would die!!


We want legal cannabis in the uk and we want our medical companies to do studies for beneficial properties


Millions of people in the uk smoke cannabis its about time the government stood up and made this legal.
